title: Lee Woo-young
text:
Lee Woo-Young (<a href="Hangul">Hangul</a>: 이우영, born August 19, 1973) is <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>n football manager and former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who played at <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>. Currently, he is coaching <a href="Senshu%20University">Senshu University</a> and Associate Professor of Senshu University.
He was member of <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">South Korea U-23</a> that <a href="Football%20at%20the%201996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a> Group C.
In 1998, at the age of 26, he retired as a football player due to injury, and started coaching.
